REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2082 reute d f BC-ELSINORE-CORP-<ELX>-Y 03-31 0085

TEXT.TITLE: ELSINORE CORP <ELX> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 4.05 dlrs vs loss 2.47 dlrs Net loss 39,598,000 vs loss 24,152,000 Revs 96.0 mln vs 87.9 mln Note: Current year figures include 7.2 mln dlr provision for anticipated loss on note receivable, 25.4 mln dlr writedown on asset carrying value and 8.5 mln dlr provision for future operating losses at Elsinore Shore Associates. Prior year figures include 10.5 mln dlr provision for future losses at Elsinore Shore Associates. Reuter
